sourcesContent: import{useContext as r,useCallback as e}from"react";import{InternalPrivyContext as t}from"./internal-context.mjs";import{PrivyContext as n}from"./privy-context.mjs";import"./index.mjs";const o=()=>{let{setUser:o,client:s}=r(t),{user:m}=r(n);return{user:m,refreshUser:e((async()=>{let r=await(s?.updateUserAndIdToken());return o(r??null),r}),[s,o])}};export{o as useUser};
